person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Because they do n't understand technology , they fear the unknown . "

2. In the second sentence, "they" is used again to refer to the same group of people who fear the unknown due to their lack of understanding of technology.

Therefore, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are the group of people referred to as "they" in both sentences.
